title: Music Near Me
body: A mobile app that will se4nd you notifications whenever a concert is playing in your area.

title: The Ultimate Tech Quiz
body: A quiz app that will test your knowledge of the tech industry, on topics such as programming, cybersecurity, database architecture, and more!

title: Roll Em Up
body: A game for Windows and macOS where players move a ball through a series of increasingly difficult mazes. The game will feature a leaderboard and achievements.

title: Habit Tracker
body: A mobile app that will help you track your habits and goals. The app will feature a calendar view, reminders, and a progress tracker.

title: Recipe Finder
body: A mobile app that will help you find recipes based on the ingredients you have on hand. The app will also feature a shopping list and meal planner.

title: Budget Tracker
body: A mobile app that will help you track your spending and savings. The app will feature a budget planner, expense tracker, and savings goal tracker.

title: Weather App
body: A mobile app that will show you the current weather conditions and forecast for your location. The app will also feature weather alerts and a radar map.

title: To-Do List
body: A mobile app that will help you keep track of your tasks and appointments. The app will feature a calendar view, reminders, and a progress tracker.

title: Fitness Tracker
body: A mobile app that will help you track your workouts and fitness goals. The app will feature a workout planner, exercise tracker, and progress tracker.

title: Meditation App
body: A mobile app that will help you relax and reduce stress. The app will feature guided meditations, breathing exercises, and sleep sounds.
